sn22.132:1.2: ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma mahakotthiko ayasmantam sariputtam etadavoca:
sn22.132:2.1: “Idhavuso, sutava ariyasavako rupassa samudayanca atthangamanca assadanca adinavanca nissarananca yathabhutam pajanati.
sn22.132:2.5: vinnanassa samudayanca atthangamanca assadanca adinavanca nissarananca yathabhutam pajanati.
